item.title: Bumrah gets to 200 wickets with the best average in Test cricket - ESPNcricinfo
item.description:
Jasprit Bumrah Achieves 200 Wickets with Record-Breaking Average

Publication Date: N/A Source: ESPN Cricinfo

Jasprit Bumrah reached the milestone of 200 Test wickets with impressive statistics, affirming his position as one of cricket's all-time great bowlers.

  • Bumrah reached his 200th wicket with an average of 19.56, the best for any bowler.
  • He is the first bowler to take 200 wickets while conceding fewer than 4000 runs.
  • His strike rate stands at 42.4, placing him among legends like Waqar Younis and Dale Steyn.
  • Bumrah has the highest percentage of wickets among Indian fast bowlers in major cricketing nations.
  • He has dismissed top batters frequently, with Joe Root being the most dismissed player.
  • Injuries have led to significant workload management to keep him fit for critical matches.
Bumrah averages a remarkable 14.4 during India's 20 Test victories, the best among Indian bowlers.

Jasprit Bumrah's career continues to inspire, and his record suggests he will play a crucial role in India's future successes.

item.title: NASA’s Parker Solar Probe makes history with closest pass to Sun - Aerospace Global News
item.description:
NASA’s Parker Solar Probe Makes History with Closest Pass to Sun

Publication Date: December 24, 2023

Source: NASA

This unprecedented achievement marks a new chapter in solar exploration, as the Parker Solar Probe flew just 3.8 million miles above the Sun's surface, traveling at 430,000 miles per hour.

  • The Parker Solar Probe completed its closest approach to the Sun on December 24, 2023.
  • It traveled at a speed of 430,000 miles per hour, the fastest for any human-made object.
  • The achievement enables scientists to gather unique data about the Sun.
  • Launched in 2018, the probe refines its trajectory with gravitational assists from Venus.
  • The spacecraft can endure temperatures exceeding 1 million degrees Fahrenheit with a specialized heat shield.
“Flying this close to the Sun is a historic moment in humanity’s first mission to a star.” - Nicky Fox, NASA Science Mission Directorate

This mission sets the stage for a new era of solar research, enhancing our understanding of stellar phenomena.

item.title: Housing supply up 44 pc in NCR this year to 53K units; luxury home share in launches 60 pc: Anarock | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
Housing supply up 44 pc in NCR this year to 53K units; luxury home share in launches 60 pc: Anarock

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Anarock

This year, the Delhi-NCR housing market experienced a remarkable 44% growth in new housing supply, amounting to 53,000 units, with a substantial share being ultra-luxury homes.

  • The number of new residential property launches totaled 36,735 units in 2023.
  • Ultra-luxury homes, priced above ₹2.5 crore, constituted nearly 60% of the new supply.
  • Sales in the Delhi-NCR market declined by 6% to 61,900 units compared to the previous year.
  • Overall housing launches in seven major Indian cities saw a 7% decrease.
  • The total sales across these seven cities also saw a marginal decline of 4% this year.
  • Anarock's Chairman noted that elections and slowed project approvals affected new housing supply.
Anarock Chairman Anuj Puri stated, "2024 has been a mixed bag for the Indian housing sector... sales also saw a marginal decline... offset by a 16 percent jump in the overall sales value."

In conclusion, despite the challenges posed by the economic environment, the luxury segment remains resilient, indicating a shift in consumer preferences in the housing market.

item.title: India vs Australia 4th Test Day 4 Highlights: Australia Make India Pay For Dropped Chances, Lead 333 At Stumps - NDTV Sports
item.description:
India vs Australia 4th Test Day 4 Highlights: Australia Make India Pay For Dropped Chances, Lead By 333 At Stumps

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: NDTV

This article highlights the events of Day 4 of the 4th Test match between India and Australia, where dropped chances cost India significantly, resulting in Australia leading by 333 runs at stumps.

  • Australia capitalized on India's missed opportunities.
  • The match sees Australia in a commanding position, leading at stumps.
  • Dropped catches by India have had crucial consequences on the match outcome.
  • Stats indicate a stark difference between both teams' fielding performances.
"India's dropped catches have allowed Australia to build a formidable lead."

This match could pivot the series in favor of Australia if they maintain their dominance, impacting India's chances in the series.

item.title: 4 dead after inhaling toxic gas at chemical unit in Gujarat - The Times of India
item.description:
4 Dead After Inhaling Toxic Gas at Gujarat Chemical Unit

Publication Date: [Insert Date] | Source: [Insert Source]

This tragic incident at a chemical unit in Gujarat has resulted in the death of four individuals due to toxic gas inhalation, raising concerns over workplace safety in hazardous environments.

  • Incident occurred at a Gujarat chemical unit.
  • Four workers died after inhaling toxic gas.
  • Authorities are investigating the cause of the gas leak.
  • Concerns are being raised about safety regulations and protections in chemical facilities.
“This incident highlights the urgent need for improving safety measures in industrial environments.”

In conclusion, this event underscores the critical importance of workplace safety and the need for stringent regulations to protect workers in hazardous conditions.

item.title: South Korea plane crash live: Jeju Air CEO apologises; 179 passengers and crew feared killed - Hindustan Times
item.description:
South Korea Plane Crash: Jeju Air CEO Apologises; 179 Passengers and Crew Feared Killed

Date: Dec 29, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

A tragic plane crash involving a Jeju Air flight has left 179 passengers and crew feared dead, with only two survivors confirmed so far. The accident occurred during landing at Muan International Airport.

  • The Jeju Air flight from Bangkok had a total of 181 people onboard.
  • Initial reports suggest a bird strike combined with adverse weather likely caused the crash.
  • Authorities have already recovered 120 bodies and continue searching for more victims.
  • The crash is being called one of the deadliest in South Korean aviation history.
  • Condolences have poured in from international leaders, expressing sorrow for the victims.
“I feel profound responsibility for this incident.” - Kim E-bae, CEO of Jeju Air.

This devastating incident has shocked the nation, prompting immediate emergency response and investigations into the causes of the crash.

item.title: Samsung Vs Apple, How Samsung Can Gain a lead On Apple in 2025 - News24
item.description:
Samsung Vs Apple: How Samsung Can Gain a Lead Over Apple in 2025

Publication Date: Dec 29, 2024 Source: News24

As the tech landscape shifts, Samsung faces challenges in standing out against Apple, particularly in regard to new AI features and innovation.

  • Samsung's recent phones struggle to differentiate themselves in a crowded market.
  • AI advancements from Apple have put pressure on Samsung to innovate.
  • The company has been criticized for lacking new and exciting designs.
  • Historical issues with product launch controversies have led Samsung to play it safe.
  • They need to evolve their product design and user interface to attract consumers.
  • Weight and balance issues have been noted in their flagship devices.
“Samsung would have to come up with unique features to sustain their brand image.”

In conclusion, Samsung's path to regain market leadership hinges on innovation, addressing consumer feedback, and the strategic integration of AI features.

item.title: Air Canada plane catches fire on landing hours after South Korea crash; airport shut - The Times of India
item.description:
Air Canada plane catches fire on landing hours after South Korea crash; airport shut

Date: October 16, 2023 | Source: Times of India

This incident occurred shortly after a tragedy involving a Jeju Air flight in South Korea, where multiple fatalities were reported. The event has raised concerns over airport safety and emergency response protocols.

  • The Air Canada flight caught fire while landing.
  • The airport has been shut down in response to the incident.
  • This fire incident follows closely after a deadly plane crash in South Korea.
  • Eyewitness accounts describe chaotic scenes as emergency services arrived.
“We were terrified when we saw the flames. It was like a bad dream.” - Eyewitness

The events have prompted investigations and a review of safety measures for landings, especially under extreme conditions.

item.title: Donald Trump accuses Dems of paying millions to Beyoncé, Oprah and others to endorse Kamala, ‘Totally against the law’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Donald Trump accuses Dems of paying millions to Beyoncé, Oprah and others to endorse Kamala, ‘Totally against the law’

Date: Dec 29, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Donald Trump has accused Democrats of paying millions to celebrities, including Beyoncé and Oprah Winfrey, to endorse Kamala Harris in an attempt to sway public opinion.

  • Trump claimed that such payments, reportedly totaling $11 million, $2 million, and $500,000, are illegal.
  • He labeled Al Sharpton a “con artist” and questioned the legitimacy of the endorsements.
  • It remains uncertain where Trump sourced his financial figures.
  • Beyoncé and Oprah have participated in Harris' campaign activities but deny receiving compensation for their endorsements.
  • Controversy surrounds whether Opra's production company received approximately $2.5 million for production services, contradicting earlier reports.
“Are the Democrats allowed to pay $11,000,000, $2,000,000, and $500,000 to get the ENDORSEMENT of Beyoncé, Oprah, and Reverend Al? I don’t think so!” – Donald Trump

This controversy emphasizes the ongoing tensions in political endorsements and the scrutiny of campaign finances.

item.description:
India vs Australia LIVE Score, 4th Test Day 4: AUS down to final wicket, but lead nears 300

Date: Dec 29, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

India vs Australia resumes with Australia in a strong position, holding a lead that approaches 300 runs. Indian bowlers, particularly Mohammed Siraj and Jasprit Bumrah, have been impactful as they capitalize on the pressure in the ongoing Test match.

  • Australia is down to their last wicket with a significant lead.
  • Mohammed Siraj and Jasprit Bumrah have been crucial, taking key wickets.
  • India's batting earlier aimed to reduce the deficit and build pressure on Australia.
  • The match remains competitive with both teams looking for an upper hand.
“Australia 135/6, lead by 240 runs at Tea.”

The contest is thrilling as each wicket presents shifting momentum, keeping the match alive with potential for all outcomes.

item.title: Vijay Sales Apple Days sale deal: iPhone 16 now starts at Rs 66,900 - The Indian Express
item.description:
Vijay Sales Apple Days sale deal: iPhone 16 now starts at Rs 66,900

Publication Date: December 2024, Source: Indian Express

The Vijay Sales Apple Days sale starts on December 29 and ends on January 5, featuring significant discounts on iPhones, iPads, and Mac products.

  • iPhone 16 now priced at Rs 66,900, down from Rs 79,900.
  • iPhone 16 Plus available for Rs 75,490.
  • Discounted prices include:
    • iPhone 16 Pro: Rs 1,03,900
    • iPhone 16 Pro Max: Rs 1,27,650
    • iPhone 15 at Rs 57,490
    • iPad 10th Gen starts at Rs 29,499.
    • MacBook Air M1 starting at Rs 63,890.
“This is the first major discount on the iPhone 16 since its launch.”

Take advantage of this opportunity to purchase the latest Apple devices at reduced prices.

item.title: "Nathan Lyon Is A Taklu ": Ex-Australia Star's Funny Comment Leaves Everyone In Splits - NDTV Sports
item.description:
Nathan Lyon Is A Taklu: Ex-Australia Star's Funny Comment Leaves Everyone In Splits

Date: December 28, 2024 | Source: NDTV

A funny conversation between former Australia cricketers Adam Gilchrist and Kerry O'Keefe is going viral on social media. The two ex-stars joked during the India vs Australia 4th Test at the Melbourne Cricket Ground, leading to much laughter among viewers.

  • Gilchrist joked about a commentary reference to a 'bald eagle', making a light-hearted poke at O'Keefe.
  • O'Keefe responded humorously, explaining the Hindi translation for 'bald' as 'Taklu', tying it back to Nathan Lyon.
  • The interaction has gone viral, showcasing the fun dynamic between the commentators.
  • Nitish Kumar Reddy also made headlines for his gritty century in the match.
  • Reddy's performance established multiple records, including for the most sixes by an Indian in a series in Australia.
“Nathan Lyon is a taklu”
— Kerry O'Keefe

The humorous remark added levity during a tense cricket match, ensuring fans were entertained both by the game and the commentary.

item.title: Pushpa 2 box office collection Day 24: Allu Arjun-starrer sees sharp jump, mints Rs 1141.35 crore - The Indian Express
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection Sees Sharp Jump

Date: December 12, 2024

Source: Indian Express

Allu Arjun’s Pushpa 2: The Rule continues its impressive box office run, achieving remarkable milestones in its fourth week.

  • The film saw a 42% increase in Saturday collections, earning Rs 12.5 crore.
  • Total domestic collection now stands at Rs 1141.35 crore.
  • The Hindi version has earned Rs 741.15 crore; Telugu version Rs 322.23 crore; Tamil version Rs 56.3 crore; Kannada and Malayalam versions Rs 7.57 crore and Rs 14.1 crore, respectively.
  • Worldwide collection of Pushpa 2 reached Rs 1719 crore, on track to surpass Baahubali 2's earnings.
“Pushpa 2 is poised to become the second-highest-grossing Indian film ever.”

The film is a tribute to Allu Arjun's star power and Sukumar’s compelling direction, featuring excellent performances from the cast.

However, the success has been marred by controversy, as Allu Arjun was involved in a court case related to a tragic stampede incident during a screening of the film.

item.title: Air Canada aircraft catches fire after scary landing hours after fatal South Korea plane tragedy - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Air Canada Aircraft Catches Fire After Scary Landing

Date: Dec 29, 2024 | Source: HT News Desk

An Air Canada flight experienced a harrowing incident at Halifax airport, skidding down the runway and catching fire due to a broken landing gear. This event occurred just hours after a deadly crash in South Korea.

  • An Air Canada flight made an emergency landing at Halifax airport.
  • The aircraft skidded and caught fire after suffering landing gear failure.
  • No casualties were reported in the Halifax incident.
  • The incident followed a tragic plane crash in South Korea, where a Jeju Air Boeing 737 exploded on landing, resulting in 179 presumed deaths.
  • Footage purportedly showed the aircraft's wings scraping the runway, leading to the fiery mishap.
“The Jeju Air plane was carrying 181 passengers; only two are confirmed survivors.”

This accident raises serious concerns about air safety, especially coming on the heels of another devastating plane mishap.

item.title: OnePlus 13, OnePlus 13R: Price In India, Full Specifications, What To Expect At Winter Launch Event On Jan 7 - Times Now
item.description:
OnePlus 13, OnePlus 13R: Price In India, Full Specifications, What To Expect At Winter Launch Event On Jan 7

Publication Date: January 7, 2024 | Source: TNN

The OnePlus 13 series is set to debut in India on January 7, 2024, featuring the flagship OnePlus 13 and the affordable OnePlus 13R, which are similar to their Chinese counterparts.

  • Launch Event: Scheduled for January 7, 2024.
  • Pricing: OnePlus 13 expected between Rs 67,000 - Rs 70,000; OnePlus 13R around Rs 40,999.
  • Specifications of OnePlus 13: 6.82-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, triple-camera setup with a 50MP primary camera, 6000mAh battery with 100W fast charging.
  • Specifications of OnePlus 13R: 6.78-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor, triple-camera setup with a 50MP main camera, support for 80W fast charging.
  • Additional Launch: OnePlus Buds Pro 3 accompanying the OnePlus 13 series.
“The OnePlus 13 is expected to showcase a massive 6,000 mAh battery with support for 100W fast charging.”

The upcoming OnePlus 13 series promises advanced features and competitive pricing, catering to both flagship and budget-conscious consumers.

item.title: Market Outlook: Bull run in new year 2025’s first week? Experts see buying opportunities in THESE stocks - ET Now
item.description:
Market Outlook: Bull run in new year 2025’s first week?

Date: Updated Dec 29, 2024

Source: ET Now News

Domestic benchmark indices ended slightly higher, with hopes for a continued bull run in the new year. Stock market experts indicate mixed signals with opportunities in specific sectors.

  • Sensex closed at 78,699.07, and Nifty at 23,813.40.
  • The market saw indecisive activity in the last week, gaining only 1% for Nifty.
  • Experts highlight buying opportunities, especially in pharma, healthcare, and select FMCG stocks.
  • Important resistance levels for Nifty identified around 24,100–24,400.
  • Traders are advised to align strategies with market conditions focusing on fundamentally strong stocks.
“The markets continue to face resistance on the upside, reinforcing our negative outlook on the index. However, individual stocks are presenting opportunities on both sides.” – Ajit Mishra, SVP, Research, Religare Broking.

As 2025 begins, investors will keep an eye on auto sales data, FII flows, and currency movements for clues on market direction.

item.title: India vs Australia 4th Test Day 4 Live Score: IND hunt more wickets after record-breaker Bumrah's burst, AUS resist - Hindustan Times
item.description:
India vs Australia 4th Test Day 4 Live Score

Date: December 29, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

The fourth Test between India and Australia has seen a dramatic session with Marnus Labuschagne and Pat Cummins extending Australia's lead to 240 runs at Tea after a fiery spell from Jasprit Bumrah, who took key wickets to damage Australia’s middle order.

  • Labuschagne and Cummins have established a significant partnership.
  • Bumrah picked up crucial wickets including Travis Head and Mitchell Marsh.
  • India's bowling attack applied pressure early, reducing Australia to 53/2 at Lunch.
  • Nitish Kumar Reddy scored 114, crucial in India's fightback.
  • Australia went into Tea at 135/6, needing to consolidate their innings while setting a challenging target.
“Jasprit Bumrah has torn into Australia's middle order and the hosts are all of a sudden down to their last four wickets with their lead less than 200.”

This match remains closely contested, with both teams having the potential for a victory as they head into the final stages of the Test.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra Could Launch On January 22: Expected Price In India, Design, Camera, Specs, All You N - Times Now
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra Could Launch On January 22: Expected Price In India, Design, Camera, Specs

Publication Date: TBD Source: TBD

Samsung is gearing up to launch the next flagship Galaxy S25 series, expected to debut on January 22, 2025, which could include the Galaxy S25, S25+, S25 Ultra, and the Galaxy S25 Slim.

  • The Galaxy S25 Ultra features a design overhaul with rounded corners and a vertical quad-camera arrangement.
  • It is expected to come in various colors including titanium black, titanium jade green, and titanium silver blue.
  • The phone may sport a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, 6.86-inch AMOLED display with 120Hz refresh rate, and a 200MP quad-camera setup.
  • Expected battery capacity of 5,000mAh with 45W fast charging.
  • Pricing for the S25 Ultra in India may start from above Rs 1,40,000, significantly higher than its predecessor.
“With the Galaxy S24 Ultra priced from Rs 1,29,999, the S25 Ultra may cross the Rs 1,40,000 mark.”

The upcoming launch of the Galaxy S25 Ultra represents Samsung's commitment to advancing smartphone technology with higher specifications and premium design.
